page.title: 06A GROUP SURVEY(CONTINUED)
page.content: The survey of grandparents showed the following:- The most popular names for grandfathers were:- {WILLIAM AND FREDERICK The most popular names for grandmothers were:- {MARY AND LILLIAN {74%}of grandfathers could{DRIVE {26%}of grandmothers could{DRIVE {62%}of grandfathers{SMOKED {46%}of grandmothers{SMOKED The average number of children in the families of grandparents was{7.5 survey of electrical appliances owned by 240 families showed the following:- {50%}had{COMPUTERS 16%}had{DISHWASHERS {53%}had{VIDEO RECORDERS {35%}had{MICRO WAVE OVENS {79%}had{DEEP FREEZE REFRIGERATORS {
